# Zensical Migration Phase Gate Checklist Template

Use this checklist to approve movement between migration phases.

## Phase gates

### Gate 1 - Prototype -> Validation

- [ ] Core prototype pages built successfully.
- [ ] Initial parity checks started.
- [ ] Preview workflow runs green.

### Gate 2 - Validation -> Pre-cutover

- [ ] Parity checklist complete.
- [ ] Config checklist complete.
- [ ] Readiness rubric score recorded.

### Gate 3 - Pre-cutover -> Cutover

- [ ] Preflight checklist complete.
- [ ] Stakeholder signoff recorded.
- [ ] Evidence bundle reviewed.

### Gate 4 - Cutover -> Closure

- [ ] Post-cutover verification complete.
- [ ] Rollback verification complete (if triggered).
- [ ] Postmortem and lessons updated.
